ContributingÂ¶

We welcome your contribution.

Please report issues via Githubs Issue tracker.

Please submit pull requests here. All pull requests should include tests. Tests should not touch Mangopay’s sandbox only the MockMangoPayApi in tests/client.py. You must however manually insure all functionatlity works against Mangopay’s sandbox.
